vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.21;
son of: Zerah (H2226J);
father of: Malchijah (H4441); also called Ethni at 1Ch.6.41;
Another name of ye.a.te.ray (יְאָֽתְרַי "Jeatherai" H2979)
§ Ethni = "my hire"
an ancestor of Asaph
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Zérah; ancestro de Asaf; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伊特尼 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我的雇價"
亞薩的先祖 (代上 6:41)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伊特尼 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我的雇价"
亚萨的先祖 (代上 6:41)
